text: Ropica formosana is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Henry Walter Bates in 1866.BioLib.cz - Ropica formosana. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It contains four subspecies, Ropica formosana formosana, Ropica formosana japonica, Ropica formosana nobuoi, and Ropica formosana tokaraensis. ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1866
title: Ropica formosana
